column4: is there a more in-depth firewall i can use in ubuntu? gui based?
i have firestarter, but it just doesn't do what i want. i want to be able to do all kinda of things with the ip's ports, everything, straight from the GUI
that's silly, anything you can do filtering wise can be done from a cli as well/better than a gui
i like GUI's. I dont like command line. i'm trying to get away from that as much as possible. i know i have to use it anyways, but i'd rather use GUI if i can
